Html: I'd be interested in a feature that allowed me to add as a requirement a minimum level of spell haste.  Is there interest in other users for something like this?  (Specifically I'm thinking for mage).
What would you use this for?

Rolling igniters want a specific fireball speed (2.09 last I checked), hunters want a specific weapon speed (2.1) for 1:1 steady shot rotation, arcane mages
may want a specific arcane rotation they're comfortable with... I can see many reasons why you'd prefer a certain amount of haste.
